ui.panel.config.energy.caption: Energy
ui.panel.config.energy.description: Monitor your energy production and consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.new_device_info: After setting up a new device, it can take up to 2 hours for new data to arrive in your energy dashboard.
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_source: Are you sure you want to delete this source?
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_integratio: Are you sure you want to delete this integration? It will remove the entities it provides
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.title: Electricity grid
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows ioBroker to track your whole home energy usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.learn_more: Daugiau informacijos apie tai, kaip pradėti.
Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
Select how ioBroker should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Use an entity with current price
Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
I do not get money back
Use an entity tracking the total recieved money
Use an entity with current rate
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.title: Saulės baterijos
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.sub: Let ioBroker monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.learn_more: Daugiau informacijos apie tai, kaip pradėti.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_return: Solar energy returned to the grid
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_predic: Prediction of your solar energy production
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.head: Configure solar panels
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.sola: Adding solar production forecast information will allow you to quickly see your expected production for today.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.title: Home Battery Storage
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.sub: If you have a battery system, you can configure it to monitor how much energy was stored and used from your battery.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.learn_mor: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.dialog.en: Energy going in to the battery (kWh)
Energy coming out of the battery (kWh)
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.title: Gas Consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.sub: Let ioBroker monitor your gas usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.paragr: Gas consumption is the volume of gas that flows to your home.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_p: Select how ioBroker should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_s: Use an entity tracking the total costs
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_e: Use an entity with current price
Entity with the current price per {unit}
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.m3_or_: ft³, m³, Wh, kWh or MWh
ui.panel.config.energy.device_consumptio: Tracking the energy usage of individual devices allows ioBroker to break down your energy usage by device.
Daugiau informacijos apie tai, kaip pradėti.
Pick entity to track energy of
Pasirinkite subjektą, kuris atspindi įrenginio energijos suvartojimą.

ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatika
ui.panel.config.automation.description: Sukurkite pasirinktas automatikos taisykles savo namams
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Automatikos redaktorius leidžia kurti ir redaguoti automatikos scenarijus. Spustelėkite toliau pateiktą nuorodą, kad perskaitytumėte instrukcijas ir įsitikintumėte, jog tinkamai sukonfigūravote ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Redagavimas leidžiamas tik automatizavimai, esantys automations.yaml
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.dev_on: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.th: Ir mes pasistengsime jį jums sukurti. Pavyzdžiui: išeidami išjunkite šviesas.
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.st: Create a new automation from scratch
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Naudokite automatikos scenarijus, kad atgaivintumėte savo namus.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Redagavimas leidžiamas tik automatizavimai, esantys automations.yaml
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: Turite neišsaugotų pakeitimų, ar tikrai norite išeiti?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.bluepr: Šis techninis planas neturi jokių įvesčių.
The mode controls what happens when the automation is triggered while the actions are still running from a previous trigger. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Trigeriai yra tai, kas pradeda automatizavimo taisyklės apdorojimą. Tai pačiai taisyklei galima nurodyti kelis aktyviklius. Kai tik įsijungs trigeris, ioBroker patikrins sąlygas, jei tokių yra, ir iškviečia veiksmą.
Treat this ID like a password: keep it secret, and make it hard to guess.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit: Sąlygos yra neprivalomos ir neleis automatikos scenarijams veikti, nebent bus įvykdytos visos sąlygos.
No visual editor support for condition: {condition}
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action: The actions are what ioBroker will do when the automation is triggered.
Stop because of an unexpected error
ui.panel.config.automation.thingtalk.tas: Type below what this automation should do, and we will try to convert it into a ioBroker automation.
Note: Only English is supported for now.

ui.panel.config.script.caption: Scenarijai
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured ioBroker correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.id_already: You can't save this script because the ID is not unique, pick another ID or leave it blank to automatically generate one.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.introducti: Use scripts to run a sequence of actions.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.modes.desc: The mode controls what happens when script is invoked while it is still running from one or more previous invocations. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.delete_con: Ar tikrai norite ištrinti šį scenarijų?

ui.panel.config.scene.description: Capture device states and easily recall them later

ui.panel.config.scene.picker.only_editab: Redaguoti galima tik scenas, esančias scenes.yaml.

ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.in: Individual entities can be added here.
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Control home when away and integrate with Alexa and Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: ioBroker Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker.
ioBroker Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: Prieš prisijungdami turite patvirtinti savo el. pašto adresą.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Įveskite savo el. pašto adresą ir mes atsiųsime jums nuorodą, kad galėtumėte iš naujo nustatyti savo slaptažodį.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Patikrinkite savo el. paštą, kuriame rasite instrukcijas, kaip iš naujo nustatyti slaptažodį.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Registruoti paskyrą
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with ioBroker Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of ioBroker Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of ioBroker away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker.
Registruodami paskyrą sutinkate su šiomis sąlygomis ir nuostatomis.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Paskyra sukurta! Patikrinkite savo el. paštą, kuriame rasite instrukcijas, kaip aktyvuoti paskyrą.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of ioBroker Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.sign_out_c: Are you sure you want to sign out?
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for ioBroker Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your ioBroker instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Tekstas į kalbą
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our Text-to-Speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote control is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: ioBroker Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance is available at your
Your instance will be available at your
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the ioBroker skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.not_: Before you can use Alexa, you need to activate the ioBroker skill for Alexa in the Alexa app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.htt: Google devices will not be able to talk locally with ioBroker because you have configured an SSL certificate for your HTTP integration.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This speeds up voice commands and allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.syn: Syncing your entities failed, try again or check the logs.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to ioBroker from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.title: Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.manage_defau: Entities can be exposed by default based on their type.

ui.panel.config.cloud.google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

ui.panel.config.devices.automation.creat: Negalima sukurti automatizavimo su išjungtu įrenginiu
ui.panel.config.devices.automation.condi: Daryti ką nors tik tuo atveju, jei…
ui.panel.config.devices.script.create_di: Negalima sukurti skripto su išjungtu įrenginiu
ui.panel.config.devices.scene.create_dis: Negalima sukurti scenos su išjungtu įrenginiu
ui.panel.config.devices.cant_edit: You can only edit items that are created in the UI.
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_rename_e: Do you also want to rename the entity IDs of your entities?
This will not change any configuration (like automations, scripts, scenes, dashboards) that is currently using these entities! You will have to update them yourself to use the new entity IDs!
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_disable_: There are no more devices for the config entry {entry_name}, do you want to instead disable the config entry?
ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_delete: Ar tikrai norite ištrinti šį įrenginį?
ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Subjektų registras
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: ioBroker keeps a registry of every entity it has ever seen that can be uniquely identified. Each of these entities will have an entity ID assigned which will be reserved for just this entity.

Naudokite subjekto registrą, kad perrašytumėte pavadinimą, pakeiskite subjekto ID arba pašalintumėte įrašą iš namų asistento. Atminkite, kad pašalindami registro įrašą tai nepanaikins pačio subjekto. Norėdami tai padaryti, sekite toliau pateiktą nuorodą ir pašalinkite ją iš integracijos puslapio.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: This will make them available in ioBroker again if they are now disabled.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Disabled entities will not be added to ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: You should remove them from your dashboard config and automations if they contain these entities.

You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart ioBroker before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.hide_sel: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard. Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with services.
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Asmenys
ui.panel.config.person.description: Manage the people that ioBroker tracks
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can add each person of interest in ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: People configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.person.no_persons_create: Looks like you have not added any people yet.
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete: Ar jūs tikrai norite ištrinti šį asmenį?
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete2: Visi šiam asmeniui priklausantys įrenginiai taps nepriskirti.
ui.panel.config.person.person_not_found: Nepavyko rasti asmens, kurį bandėte redaguoti.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.name: Vardas
ui.panel.config.person.detail.no_device_: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.confirm_de: Ar tikrai norite panaikinti {name} vartotojo abonementą? Jūs vis dar galėsite sekti vartotoją, bet asmuo nebegalės prisijungti.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.local_only: Can only log in from the local network
ui.panel.config.zone.caption: Zonos
ui.panel.config.zone.description: Manage the zones you want to track people in
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Zones allow you to specify certain regions on earth. When a person is within a zone, the state will take the name from the zone. Zones can also be used as a trigger or condition inside automation setups.
ui.panel.config.zone.no_zones_created_ye: Looks like you have not added any zones yet.
ui.panel.config.zone.confirm_delete: Ar jūs tikrai norite ištrinti šią zoną?
ui.panel.config.zone.configured_in_yaml: Zones configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Drag the marker on the map to move the home zone.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone_narr: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
ui.panel.config.zone.home_zone_core_conf: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.name: Name
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.icon_error_m: Piktograma turi būti tokio formato: „prefix: iconname“, pvz .: „mdi: home“
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.
ui.panel.config.integrations.caption: Integracijos
ui.panel.config.integrations.description: Manage integrations with services or devices
ui.panel.config.integrations.confirm_new: Do you want to set up {integration}?
ui.panel.config.integrations.no_integrat: Seems like you don't have any integrations configured yet. Click on the button below to add your first integration!
ui.panel.config.integrations.note_about_: No integrations matched your search, the integration you want to set up might not be available to set up via the UI yet.
ui.panel.config.integrations.rename_dial: Edit the name of this config entry
ui.panel.config.integrations.ignore.conf: Are you sure you don't want to set up this integration? You can undo this by clicking the 'Show ignored integrations' in the overflow menu on the top right.
This will make the integration appear in your discovered integrations again when it gets discovered. This might require a restart or take some time.
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: Are you sure you want to delete the {title} integration?
Restart ioBroker to finish removing this integration
Restart ioBroker to finish reloading this integration
Restart ioBroker to finish disabling this integration
Restart ioBroker to finish enabling this integration
Enabling or disabling of the integration failed

Automatic polling for updated data disabled
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_flow: This integration does not support configuration via the UI. If you followed this link from the ioBroker website, make sure you run the latest version of ioBroker.
Not all required fields are filled in.
Šiam veiksmui atlikti reikia apsilankyti išorinėje svetainėje.

ui.panel.config.users.caption: Vartotojai
ui.panel.config.users.users_privileges_n: The user group feature is a work in progress. The user will be unable to administer the instance via the UI. We're still auditing all management API endpoints to ensure that they correctly limit access to administrators.
ui.panel.config.users.editor.caption: Peržiūrėti vartotoją
ui.panel.config.users.editor.name: Rodomas pavadinimas
ui.panel.config.users.editor.local_only: Can only log in from the local network
ui.panel.config.users.add_user.caption: Pridėti vartotoją
Manage the OAuth Application Credentials used by Integrations
Application Credentials in use by an integration may not be removed.
ui.panel.config.mqtt.title: MQTT
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Devices will show up here once discovered.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: No devices were found, make sure they are in pairing mode and keep them awake while ioBroker is searching.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.introductio: Clusters are the building blocks for Zigbee functionality. They separate functionality into logical units. There are client and server types and that are comprised of attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
Get the value for the selected attribute.
Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_commands.hel: Select a command to interact with.
ui.panel.config.zha.network.caption: Tinklas
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.caption: Grupės
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.group_details: Čia pateikiama visa informacija apie pasirinktą Zigbee grupę.
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.create_group_: Enter the required details to create a new Zigbee group
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.group_: Select a group to issue a bind command.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.cluste: Select clusters to bind to the selected group.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.bind_b: Bind the selected group to the selected device clusters.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.unbind: Unbind the selected group from the selected device clusters.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.common.in_progr: Z-Wave JS is searching for devices
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.intro: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave devices
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.stati: Number of messages successfully sent to the controller
Number of messages successfully received by the controller
Number of messages from the controller that were dropped by the host
Number of outgoing messages that were dropped because they could not be sent
Number of messages that the controller did not accept
Number of collisions while sending a message to the controller
Number of transmission attempts where an ACK was missing from the controller
Number of transmission attempts where the controller response did not come in time
Number of transmission attempts where the controller callback did not come in time
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_statistics: # of commands successfully sent to the node
# of commands received from the node, including responses to sent commands
# of outgoing commands that were dropped because they could not be sent
# of commands from the node that were dropped by the host
# of Get-type commands where the node's response did not come in time
Average round-trip-time in ms of commands to this node
Average RSSI in dBm of frames received by this node
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.route_statistic: The used data rate for this route
Which nodes are repeaters for this route and their RSSI
The RSSI of the ACK frame received by the controller
The nodes between which the transmission failed most recently
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.int: Manage and adjust device specific configuration parameters for the selected device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.att: Įrenginio konfigūracijos parametrus ir aprašymus pateikia {device_database}
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.bat: Įrenginiai su baterijomis turi būti pažadinti, kad būtų galima atnaujinti jų konfigūraciją. Instrukcijas, kaip pažadinti įrenginį, rasite įrenginio vadove.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.set: Parametro pakeitimas buvo įrašytas į eilę ir bus atnaujintas, kai įrenginys pabus.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.follow: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.choose: How do you want to add your device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.qr_cod: If your device supports SmartStart you can scan the QR code for easy pairing.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.inclus: The device could not be added.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.check_: Please check the logs for more information.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.provis: The device has been added. Once you power it on, it will become available.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.interv: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.provisioned.con: Are you sure you want to unprovision the device?
If you unprovision the device it will not be added to ioBroker when it is powered on. If it is already added to ioBroker, removing the provisioned device will not remove it from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.security_classe: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included
Example: Lighting, Sensors and Security Systems
Example: Door Locks and Garage Doors
Example: Legacy Door Locks without S2 support
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.int: Remove a device from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.con: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.fol: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_failed_n: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
The device removal is in progress.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.tr: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.ru: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.he: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.intro: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.traff: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.heali: Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.netwo: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.update_firmware: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The ioBroker and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update, or uncheck the box to have the driver attempt to figure it out from the firmware file.
The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?
To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.

ui.panel.config.storage.caption: Storage
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.title: Move datadisk
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.descrip: You are currently using ''{current_path}'' as datadisk. Moving data disks will reboot your device and it's estimated to take {time} minutes. Your ioBroker installation will not be accessible during this period. Do not disconnect the power during the move!
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.moving_: Rebooting and moving datadisk. Please have patience
ui.panel.config.system_health.caption: System Health
ui.panel.config.system_health.descriptio: Status, metrics and integration startup time
ui.panel.config.system_dashboard.confirm: Restarting ioBroker will stop all your active dashboards, automations and scripts.
ui.panel.config.advanced_mode.hint_enabl: Trūksta konfigūracijos parinkčių? Įjungti išplėstinį režimą
ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Pritaikymai
ui.panel.config.introduction: Šiame vaizde galima sukonfigūruoti savo komponentus ir ioBroker. Dar ne viską galima sukonfigūruoti iš vartotojo sąsajos (UI ), tačiau mes prie to dirbame.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.help_sou: Konfigūracijos parametrų aprašymai ir žinyno tekstas pateikiami OpenZWave projekto.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.introduc: Valdyti skirtingus Z-Wave mazgo konfigūracijos parametrus.
ui.panel.config.server_control.descripti: Paleisti iš naujo ir sustabdyti ioBroker serverį
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.s: Ar jūs tikrai norite sustabdyti ioBroker?
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Patikrinkite konfigūraciją, jei neseniai atlikote kai kuriuos konfigūracijos pakeitimus ir įsitikinkite, kad visa konfigūracija teisinga.
